channel.title: Articles on Oberhauser Foundation News
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Oberhauser Foundation News

item.title: Grants 2020
item.description: Year 2020 Update — This article gives a high level overview on how the 2020 grants have been distributed. For obvious reasons only categories and percentages are shared. The article gives also insight into why these categories have been selected.

item.title: Endowment 2020
item.description: Year 2020 Update — This article outlines the targeted capital distribution and endowment structure of 2020. For information about the distribution of grants in 2020 see article Grants 2020.

item.title: Oberhauser Foundation Launch
item.description: Boston, Massachusetts USA — June 29th, 2020 — The Oberhauser Foundation was established under the charter of the Oberhauser Dynasty in the midst of the global COVID-19 pandemic and a global economical crisis.
